nodes.text: Besh Company was a company in the Second Battalion of the Fifth Infantry, a division in the Imperial Army of the Sith Empire during the Cold War. It was stationed with Aurek and Cresh Companies on Balmorra, where the entire battalion was under the command of Major Tyrus, and the three companies were tasked with fighting the Balmorran resistance in Broken Valley. Besh Company's First Platoon was wiped out in an attack on the Okara Droid Factory.
